Class MessageCollection

uk.ac.port.setap.team6c.database.MessageCollection

public class MessageCollection extends Object implements Iterable<Message>

  • Method Details

    • toList

      public List<Message> toList()
      Convert this MessageCollection to a list of messages

      Note that this method will access the database for each message in the collection and will create an instance of Message for each message. This can be an expensive operation if the collection is large. The size of the collection should be checked before calling this method using size(). Prefer using the iterator returned by iterator() if you only need to iterate over the collection as this will lazy-load the messages from the database as they are encountered.

      If the message does not exist in the database, the message will not be included in the list. This may result in the list being smaller than the collection in rare cases.

      Returns:
      A list of messages
